title: Preview of Brosse
content: Greater Albion Typefounders have just posted the first preview of their next release, Brosse on their [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202231534/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/). Brosse is a lively slabserif face that emphasises simple geometric curves.
author: Rasendyll

comments.content: We've now posted a second preview - [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202231534/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/) - showing all eight faces of the Brosse family.
Every time people ask me why I don’t just hurry up and release more fonts I’ll point them at Brosse.

Brosse is now released [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202231534/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/brosse/overview.html) on Myfonts.com.

A fully licensed, but reduced (in terms of character set) face is offered along with the eight other members of the family. We've also posted some examples of Brosse in use on our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202231534/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/).
